# vp

The vnode from which to remove extended attributes.

## Fields

- **name**: Which attribute to delete.
- **options**: XATTR_NOSECURITY: bypass security-checking.
- **ctx**: Context to authenticate for attribute delete request.

items.description: Context to authenticate for attribute delete request.
